attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am desgusted that this affects the lower paued, thoses who are single and trying to buy there own home get no support at all.  They get no chance of a council house unless they have children, who are helping them.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
